description: godoc: added an opensearch description document.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hi Rob,

modern browsers will recognize this OpenSearch description document and 
might
add it to the list of known search engines.

For example, with this CL applied, the search box of Firefox will offer you
an »Add "godoc"« option and further searches can be done using the search
box of FF, or alternatively by using the address bar with a specific prefix
("golang.org" by default).

Regards,
Christoph
Can you please explain what this is about?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1f8ad6d6cafa ***

godoc: added an opensearch description document.

R=golang-dev, r, tux21b, rsc
CC=golang-dev
